code:
# @param {String} s
# @param {Integer[][]} queries
# @return {Boolean[]}
def can_make_palindrome_queries(s, queries)
    n = s.length
    prefix_sum = Array.new(n + 1) { Array.new(26, 0) }
    
    # Build prefix sum array for character frequencies
    (1..n).each do |i|
        prefix_sum[i] = prefix_sum[i-1].dup
        prefix_sum[i][s[i-1].ord - 'a'.ord] += 1
    end

    queries.map do |(ai, bi, ci, di)|
        # Calculate character counts for both halves
        left_char_counts = Array.new(26, 0)
        right_char_counts = Array.new(26, 0)
        
        # Calculate frequency for left half
        (0..25).each do |i|
            left_char_counts[i] = prefix_sum[bi + 1][i] - prefix_sum[ai][i]
        end
        
        # Calculate frequency for right half
        (0..25).each do |i|
            right_char_counts[i] = prefix_sum[di + 1][i] - prefix_sum[ci][i]
        end
        
        # Check if it's possible to form a palindrome
        mismatch_count = 0
        (0..25).each do |i|
            mismatch_count += (left_char_counts[i] - right_char_counts[i]).abs
        end
        
        mismatch_count <= 2
    end
end
